about_the_game:
World of Reinvention is an adventure rpg for the ages set in a wondrous fantasy world brimming with places to discover, creatures to encounter, and oh ever so much to learn. Who you will be is entirely up to you but be wary, the fate of this world is in your hands (probably).


"Who in the world am I? Ah, that's the great puzzle."
- Lewis Carroll, Alice's Adventures in Wonderland

(Re)Invent Yourself

Your character, your choices.
Without set classes, you are free to grow your character as you wish. Gain skills and grow stronger based on how you interact with the world. Will you be a great hero? A cunning thief? A master of negotiation? Or something entirely different? Go live it!

To Adventure!

Discover a wondrous fantasy world, and feel immersed in each new region that you come across. Find new resources, meet curious creatures, and uncover hidden secrets!

Seize the Day!

A great adventurer must always be well-fed and supplied! Experiment to gain new culinary recipes, pay for a hot meal from a worthy chef, or just enjoy the sublime simple pleasure of roasting mushrooms on a stick.
Craft tools and equipment to assist on your journey. Advance your knowledge by training skills and discovering new resources. Keep your wits about you and never discount the benefits of a good night's sleep.

Make Friends...Or Enemies

Branching, context-based dialog and non-linear questing means that every experience in the World of Reinvention will be a unique one. Choose your actions wisely as they may have consequences far beyond the immediate.
